episodes.synopsis: Operation Rolling Thunder and the arrival of American ground forces in South Vietnam commence the war, and U.S. troops face determined resistance.
episodes.title: The Beginning (1964-1965)

episodes.synopsis: While military planners measure success in terms of enemy casualties, the American public voices misgivings about U.S. strategy.
episodes.title: Search & Destroy (1966-1967)

episodes.synopsis: The Tet Offensive temporarily staggers American and South Vietnamese forces and triggers a wave of antiwar protests back home.
episodes.title: The Tet Offensive (1968)

episodes.synopsis: The draft picks up pace as "boots on the ground" in Vietnam reach record levels, and Richard Nixon rides antiwar sentiment to victory.
episodes.title: An Endless War (1968-1969)

episodes.synopsis: American troops train their South Vietnamese counterparts to take charge of the war, even as the conflict spreads into Cambodia.
episodes.title: A Changing War (1969-1970)

episodes.synopsis: Fierce fighting continues into the war's final days, and the fall of Saigon punctuates the final withdrawal of American troops.
episodes.title: Peace with Honor (1971-1975)

video.title: Vietnam in HD
video.synopsis: Using uncensored archival footage -- much of it shot by soldiers -- this gripping series profiles 13 men and women who survived the Vietnam War.
